item.title: Check Point warns that free USB devices may be carriers of malware
item.description:
Source: Victoria Police. The unmarked USB drives used are similar to these. On September 21st, law enforcement in Victoria, Australia, issued a warning to residents of Pakenham, a Melbourne suburb, about unlabeled USB drives found in mailboxes. According to the Victoria police statement, people have been discovering unmarked USB drives in their mailboxes. When connected to computers, these drives have exposed victims to fraudulent streaming service offers and other serious problems...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/check-point-warns-that-free-usb-devices-may-be-carriers-of-malware/
